item.title: University & Research Institution Training
item.description:
Hands-on UAS training for academic research programs, aerospace engineering curricula, and university laboratories.

We provide capability-based operator training and assessment services that complement academic theory with demonstrable, hands-on proficiency.

Who We Serve

Research Universities

  • Aerospace engineering programs requiring practical UAS instruction
  • Research laboratories needing trained operators for experimental platforms
  • Graduate programs in robotics, autonomy, and controls
  • Interdisciplinary research centers (sensor development, AI/ML, etc.)

Community Colleges & Technical Schools

  • Aviation maintenance programs expanding into UAS
  • Engineering technology curricula
  • Workforce development programs for UAS technicians

University Research Labs

  • Autonomy research requiring platform operators
  • Sensor development needing flight test capability
  • Multi-vehicle systems and swarm research
  • Human-robot interaction studies

Training Services for Universities

1. Student Operator Training

Hands-on instruction preparing students to safely operate research platforms

item.title: Prime Contractor Services
item.description:
Training, assessment, and train-the-trainer services for defense contractors fielding UAS platforms and capabilities.

We help prime contractors and system integrators develop operator proficiency programs, validate training effectiveness, and reduce lifecycle support costs.

Who We Serve

Defense Prime Contractors

  • Platform manufacturers fielding new UAS systems
  • System integrators delivering turnkey capabilities
  • ISR solution providers with complex sensor payloads
  • Autonomy developers requiring operator training on AI-enabled systems

Mid-Tier Defense Companies

  • Engineering services firms supporting DoD programs
  • Software developers with operator-facing interfaces
  • Sensor manufacturers requiring platform integration knowledge
  • Communications companies fielding C2 systems

Commercial-to-Government Crossover

  • Dual-use technology providers entering defense market
  • Commercial UAS manufacturers adapting to government requirements
  • AI/ML companies with defense applications

Services for Prime Contractors

1. Operator Training for Platform Fielding

End-user training programs for government customers receiving your systems
